name: Seawar Gunship Air 3D
description:
Seawar Gunship Air 3D is a full of destruction and warrior 3D game. this game is full of war ships under the sea water and enemy equiped with full of weapons like Gun strikers , Rocket launchers , AK-47 and many others weapons with heavy gunners shooting effects and fists. Be a cool commando and take adventure to city and jungle to kill all the enemies into the sec have a good and great luck for surving of gunship gunner war city wold war into jungle city and sea
Feature
Multiple action simulation shooting survival game mode
Smooth and realistic helicopter controls with firing option
Night vision environment, where you see the firing lighting
Battle-filed night war
Task force action game
